extracted_text:
Significant Corporate Development: Newspaper Publication Regarding Transfer of Equity Shares to IEPF Significant Corporate Development: Newspaper Publication Regarding Transfer of Equity Shares to IEPF

On August 27, 2025, Asian Paints Ltd. published a notice in newspapers regarding the transfer of equity shares to the Investor Education and Protection Fund (IEPF) Authority. This action was taken in accordance with Regulation 30, read with Para A, Part A of Schedule III of the Listing Regulations.

This notice served as a communication to shareholders about the impending transfer of their shares to the IEPF Authority, as mandated by the Companies Act, 2013, and the IEPF Authority (Accounting, Audit, Transfer and Refund) Rules, 2016.

Note: While this is a significant corporate development requiring disclosure, it pertains to a regulatory compliance matter and does not necessarily indicate a change in the company's financial performance or business strategy.
